name: Ritual Cool
description:
A game made in 48 hours @ Global Game Jam Rome



HOW TO PLAY

Phase 1 - Summon

  • Hit the bongos as fast as you can to awake the Totem Golem first, so you can gain energy before your opponent

Phase 2 - GO!

  • SX Player buttons: Attack with left bongos (up and down) Defend with right Bongo (up and down)
  • DX Player buttons: Attack with right bongos (up and down) Defend with left Bongo (up and down)
  • Attack the Stones and defend from the fire.

Phase 3 - FIGHT!

  • Fight the opponent! Attack or defend as before!

You can use two PG gamepad too, but is not that cool!
